alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:55AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 3.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate below flood stage this afternoon. It will rise above flood stage this evening with a maximum value of 4.3 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 3.7 Tue 5 am CST 4.0 4.2 4.1 &&
